Title: XML External Entity Reference
Description: An issue was discovered in service-api before 4.3.12 and 5.x before 5.1.1 for Report Portal. It allows XXE, with resultant secrets disclosure and SSRF, via JUnit XML launch import.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 4.3.12, all versions starting from 5.0.0 before 5.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 4.3.12 before 5.0.0, all versions starting from 5.1.1
